LanguageData.GFL_Weapon_Suomi.label: Suomi SMG
LanguageData.GFL_Weapon_Suomi.description: A Finnish submachine gun with advanced frost-based combat systems. When equipped, grants the wielder access to Freeze Shot and Frost Barrier abilities.
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_FreezeShot.label: Freeze Shot
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_FreezeShot.description: Launch a freezing bolt at an enemy, dealing weapon damage plus 10-20 frost damage. Each allied pawn within 6 tiles of the target adds 0.5 seconds of stun duration.
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_FrostBarrier.label: Frost Barrier
LanguageData.GFL_Ability_FrostBarrier.description: Create a frost zone at target location. Deals 10-20 damage to all enemies within 3 tiles, applies Avalanche debuff (20% slow, +20% damage taken for 5s), creates frost terrain for 1 hour, and grants all allies a Frost Barrier shield (80 HP, heals 1 HP/sec, cleanses 1 debuff, lasts 30s).
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_FrostBarrier.label: frost barrier
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_FrostBarrier.description: A protective frost shield that absorbs up to 80 damage and heals the bearer for 1 HP per second. Automatically expires after 30 seconds or when the shield is depleted.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Avalanche.label: avalanche
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_Avalanche.description: Movement slowed by 20% and damage taken increased by 20%. Applied by Frost Barrier ability.
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_FrostTerrain.label: frost terrain
LanguageData.GFL_Hediff_FrostTerrain.description: Standing on frost terrain. Movement slowed by 10% and damage taken increased by 10%.
LanguageData.GFL_FrostDamage.label: frost
LanguageData.GFL_FrostTerrain.label: frost zone
LanguageData.GFL_FrostTerrain.description: A frozen area created by Frost Barrier. Slows enemies and makes them more vulnerable.
